entry.title: Python trigonometry calculator
entry.content:
Description:

This is a post about the development of a suite of trigonometry calculations using various different modules in Python

Link to Github repository:

https://github.com/evanzhu0504/Trigonometry-Calc

Link to code file:

https://github.com/evanzhu0504/Trigonometry-Calc/blob/main/trigcal.py

Features:

  • Pythagoras Theorem
  • Sin, Cos, Tan for unknown angle and sides
  • Laws of Sine, Cosine
  • Area of a triangle using sine laws
  • Graphing calculator supporting Sine and Cosine waves
  • Basic authentication system (username, password) via json readable writable file

entry.title: Site Code of Conduct
entry.content:
Some basic rules:

  • This site is absolutely sfw, nsfw comments will be blocked as possibly IP banned
  • Other than that, please do not DDOS the site

entry.title: Website Building
entry.content:
Framework

This website is based on Hexo framework
Using the butterfly theme of hexo
Future deployment on the cloud via WordPress
